text: Annabel Lee or Annabelle Lee, is a poem which was composed by author Edgar Allan Poe. This story is about a man who lost the love of his life and finally met the girl Annabelle. But there was a tragic incident, where Annabel was killed by the angels because they were jealous of the love that Annabel and the other man had in their hearts. ==References== Category:Poems
title: Annabel Lee
